title: Drawing, "Clapboard Shack", 1862
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue paper
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite with color notations throughout.
Verso:  Inscribed with signature of : Captain Albert V. Meeks/ Company G-Anerson / Zouaves-62-N-Y-S-V-
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a clapboard shack with an arbor over the doorway and a smaller shack visible behind, to the right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Clapboard Shack", 1862.
1862. Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-97.
